results.title: Metformin reverses fatty liver disease in obese, leptin-deficient mice.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ improved @DISEASE_Fatty_Liver @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@fatty liver disease@@@, reversing @<m>DISEASE_Hepatomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006529 @@@hepatomegaly@@@, @DISEASE_Fatty_Liver @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@steatosis@@@ and @DISEASE_Gyrate_Atrophy @DISEASE_MESH:D015799 @@@aminotransferase abnormalities@@@.
